name: Snaker 3D
description:
After seeing a game by Bleep Bleep I decided to make my own iteration with more comfortable controls and such. One thing lead to another and now its... amazing.

Bleep Bleep's Game. Very Bleep BleepMy Game SNAke. Yes uhm why are you here?
Features: General Randomness
The World Resizes As You Play
Epic Random Fog
Delicious Tasting Voice-lines
Crunchy Chomping Sounds
Music Controls: Looking with mouse
W or S for up and down
Space or Control for up and down
Up and Down for up and down This game was made part time during the course of 7 days.
